activities.description: Wellness activities page with breathing exercises, meditation, journaling, and more

dashboard.description: User dashboard showing mood tracking, insights, and trends

activities.title: 5-Minute Breathing Exercise
activities.description: Practice deep breathing to reduce stress and anxiety

activities.title: Guided Meditation
activities.description: Listen to a calming meditation session

activities.title: Body Scan Meditation
activities.description: Progressive relaxation from head to toe

activities.title: Take a Walk Outside
activities.description: Get some fresh air and gentle movement

activities.title: Dance Break
activities.description: Put on your favorite song and move your body

activities.title: Gratitude Journaling
activities.description: Write down three things you're grateful for today

activities.title: Mood Reflection
activities.description: Reflect on what influenced your mood today

activities.title: Future Self Visualization
activities.description: Imagine your best self and what they would do

activities.title: Free-form Doodling
activities.description: Let your creativity flow with simple drawing

activities.title: Music Therapy
activities.description: Listen to music that matches or improves your mood

activities.title: Reach Out to Someone
activities.description: Send a message to a friend or family member

activities.title: Self-Compassion Practice
activities.description: Write yourself a kind and encouraging message
